label: uncl7139
comment: Code specifying the identification of a product characteristic.

values.label: TCV
values.comment: TCV tariff is applicable for the given travel service (TCV = Tarif Commun Voyageurs, ordinary tariff for travellers).

values.label: Global tariff
values.comment: All inclusive tariff is applicable for the given travel service.

values.label: East - West tariff
values.comment: Tariff used for traffic from east to west or vice versa.

values.label: No published tariff
values.comment: There is no published tariff for the service.

values.label: Train with TCV or Market Price
values.comment: Train running with service that can be sold at TCV (Tarif Commun Voyageurs - ordinary tariff for travellers) or Market Price.
